entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h early this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
